actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

official_title: A bill to provide for a Veterans' Administration general medical and surgical hospital at Jacksonville, Florida, and to achieve cooperation with the University of Florida College of Medicine in its activities in Jacksonville.

summary.text: Directs the Administrator of Veterans Affairs to construct a Veterans Administration hospital in Jacksonville, Florida. Requires the Administrator to secure the cooperation of the University of Florida College of Medicine in its training of medical students in Jacksonville. Authorizes appropriations.

titles.title: A bill to provide for a Veterans' Administration general medical and surgical hospital at Jacksonville, Florida, and to achieve cooperation with the University of Florida College of Medicine in its activities in Jacksonville.
